title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve
title_original: SANGTREE Women's Turtleneck Sweater Long Sleeve Casual Fall Winter Knit Pullover Sweater Top

reviews.customers_say: Customers love the softness of this turtleneck sweater, describing it as feeling like a dream against the skin, and appreciate its good fit with plenty of sleeve length. Customers find it comfortable, with one mentioning it doesn't irritate sensitive skin, and consider it a classic turtleneck style.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality
items.body: I tried it and it’s true to size, fits nicely, soft and sloops little good quality. I was surprised that there is no tag to indicate front or back side, as seam for turtleneck is on the side and not back. I hope it washes well as I read in reviews before purchasing. Read more
items.author: Patricia G

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, lovely turtleneck
items.body: This is a great sweater, good color (and color as pictured on line). Read more
items.author: joan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice fit and value.
items.body: Really nice turtleneck sweaters for the price. They wash beautifully without pilling. I purchased two -- brown and black -- in size L. Run slightly big, but not enough to size down, in my opinion. I'm removing one star for the brown sweater because the color is much lighter than depicted. It's almost more of a brick-brown than a deep chocolate brown. Five stars for the black sweater. Read more
items.author: Golden Idaho

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater!
items.body: Love it! Lovely color, feels soft and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Phoebe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Women's Fine Knit Turtleneck Sweater
items.body: Love these sweaters with a nice stretch that doesn't cling to be tight,generous length but not tunic long, very nice colors-pink, lavender,light blue,white-and doesn't wrinkle, sleeve length is alright for shorter arms to turn up if you want,roomy enough for comfort. In your size the sweater isn't tight fitting and looks good under blazer. Read more
items.author: Sue B.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Neck
items.body: The neck is very small. The color is great as is the feel of the sweater. Read more
items.author: Vicki Barzen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smart looking
items.body: Beautiful color. True. Great fit. Looks very expensive. Read more
items.author: pems-integ-tests

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect holiday turtleneck
items.body: This is a great little sweater that washes and dries well. It runs a little small, so don't hesitate to size up. The material is not 100% cotton but it's a nice soft blend that hasn't started pilling after two washes. I got the snowflake option and I wore it under a green quilted field jacket to go Christmas tree shopping! It was perfect! Read more
items.author: Mrs. Work From Home

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Strawberry Pink, 6-grey, 7-lilac Colour, 5-camel, Coffee, Fair Isle Pink, Orange, Rose Red, Checkered Khaki, Christmas Blue, Haze Blue, Christmas Navy Blue, Christmas Red, Fair Isle White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
